Name: File: Grade.py various formatting fixes
Notes:
1. Re-order grade_item, student, and comment to follow the order that parameters are asked for in the function for Grade __init__ constructor. 
Ex: 
Since parameters are (self, grade_item, student, comment)
      do:
             self.__grade_item = grade_item
             self.__student = student
             self.__comment = comment
      instead.

2. Put one line docstring on one line following PEP 8 coding standards for line 11.
Ex:
'''Object to hold an actual student numeric grade with a value and public/private feedback'''

3. Put the end of docstring ''' on it's own line following PEP 8 coding standards for line 27
Ex:
"""def __init__(self,userId,value,maxValue,name='',public_feedback='',private_feedback=''):
...
self.private_feedback = private_feedback
"""

3. There is a typo in line 62 because of an extra s in user.
Ex:
return self._grade_item.get_user() instead of 
return self._grade_item.get_usser()

4. Re-order docstring description of GradeItems constructor attributes to be in the same order on the design wrapper document class diagram. Also, value should be a float, not an int.
Ex:
        """
        Constructor:
            grade_item(GradeItem Object)
            student(OrgMember)
            comment(feedbacks) string
            value(mark student scored) float
        """
